channel.title: Crossbow Emote?
channel.description: I was wondering where you get the new crossbow emote? Like the one on Runescape now. The old one sucks. I searched all through google and got no help. Can anyone else help?

item.title: Crossbow Emote?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:7, topic:340959”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=437353.msg3213861#msg3213861 date=1274533703]
I was wondering where you get the new crossbow emote? Like the one on Runescape now. The old one sucks. I searched all through google and got no help. Can anyone else help?
[/quote]

You have to do SWATs emote system tutorial, but after you do you can add this.

if (j == 4230) { int file = 1088; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {64,74,75,76,77,78,79,80,81,65,66,67,68,69,70,71,72,73,249,0}; int[] delays = {10,5,4,4,3,3,5,11,3,4,5,6,3,3,3,3,3,2,1,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }[/quote]
I could not find that tutorial; And where would you add that?

Read full topic

item.title: Crossbow Emote?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Impious Lols:

I was wondering where you get the new crossbow emote? Like the one on Runescape now. The old one sucks. I searched all through google and got no help. Can anyone else help?

You have to do SWATs emote system tutorial, but after you do you can add this.

if (j == 4230) { int file = 1088; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {64,74,75,76,77,78,79,80,81,65,66,67,68,69,70,71,72,73,249,0}; int[] delays = {10,5,4,4,3,3,5,11,3,4,5,6,3,3,3,3,3,2,1,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }

Read full topic
